examples.example: 我认真地写了一篇充满真情实感的文章。

translate.english: I seriously wrote an article full of true feelings.

examples.example: 我花费了不少时间完成了一篇精彩绝伦的作文。

translate.english: I spent quite a lot of time completing a wonderful composition.

examples.example: 我今天写了一篇积极向上的日记，记录生活中的美好点滴。

translate.english: I wrote a positive diary today, recording the beautiful bits and pieces in life.
